text:
In this example header.jsp is included in test.jsp with a parameter. But the parameter is missing in the request object in the included jsp. Setting the parameter directly with <% request.setAttribute( "testparam", "1" ); %> works. test.jsp: title
BODY
header.jsp: <% java.util.Enumeration enum = request.getAttributeNames(); while( enum.hasMoreElements() ) { out.println( enum.nextElement() ); } %>
creator: klaus.mutzbauer@moresophy.de
